description: Not your average 1/2 zip. This sweater is made from Incrediwool, an Italian recycled wool blend that lives up to its name. The beautiful bouclé texture of this style stands out, and is complemented by fun color blocking and trims that add pops of color while elevating the overall look.
name: Prana IncrediWool 1/2 Zip - Mens

specs.value: 44% Recycled Polyester, 37% Recycled Wool, 13% Nylon, 3% Elastane, 3% Other Fibers
